title: Lynda - Character Development and Design
description:
Lynda - Character Development and Design

FYI : This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 25m Beginner Apr 12, 2016  | Uploaded in Apr 28, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject: Design 
Author: Mary Jane Begin 

The heart of most narrative art lies in the characters in the story. This course will reveal the "secret sauce" that makes a character memorable, beloved, villainous, funny, or celebrated. Mary Jane Beginâ€”illustrator, author, and Rhode Island School of Design professorâ€”explores character design from all corners of the illustration universe, including cartoons, comics, feature animation, gaming, kid's books, and advertising.â€¨â€¨Mary Jane explains how the components of good character design can be broken down into concrete elements. She shows how body shape, posture, anatomy, facial expression, costume, color, movement, and abstract aspects like archetypes and environment bring a character to life. The lessons are illustrated with examples from Mary Jane's books, as well as famous, heart-warming characters created by a group of extraordinary character designers.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Capturing the heart and soul of a character
	â€¢	Using the right t
	â€¢	ools
	â€¢	Relying on archetypes
	â€¢	Adding motion
	â€¢	Painting shapes and silhouettes
	â€¢	Understanding anatomy and proportion
	â€¢	Creating easy-to-read facial expressions
	â€¢	Coloring your character
	â€¢	Designing a cast of characters
	â€¢	Making fantasy creatures believable
	â€¢	Going from 2D to 3D
